title: The quantum uncertainty relations of quantum channels
authors: Shi-Yun Kong, Ming-Jing Zhao, Zhi-Xi Wang, Shao-Ming Fei
abstract:
The uncertainty relation reveals the intrinsic difference between the
classical world and the quantum world. We investigate the quantum uncertainty
relation of quantum channel in qubit systems. Under two general measurement
bases, we first derive the quantum uncertainty relation for quantum channels
with respect to the relative entropy of coherence. Then we obtain the quantum
uncertainty relation for unitary channels with respect to the $l_1$ norm of
coherence. Some examples are given in detail.
